action.content:
You are playing a text adventure game. I will describe what you can perceive in the game. You write the single action you want to take in the game starting with >. Only reply with an action.
For example:
> open cupboard

You can have up to two objects in your inventory at the same time.

Your goal for this game is: Put the potted plant on the side table, the plate on the shelf and the mop in the freezer.

Once you have achieved your goal, write "> done" to end the game.

You are in a living room now. There are a shelf, a chair and a couch. There are passages to a hallway, a bedroom and a kitchen here.
You are in a kitchen now. There are a cupboard and a counter. The cupboard is closed. There are passages to a living room and a pantry here.
The cupboard is now open. In the cupboard there is a plate.
You take the plate. In your inventory you have a plate.
You are in a living room now. There are a shelf, a chair and a couch. There are passages to a hallway, a bedroom and a kitchen here.
You put the plate on the shelf.
You are in a hallway now. There is a potted plant. The potted plant is on the floor. There are passages to a living room and a broom closet here.
You take the potted plant. In your inventory you have a potted plant.
You are in a living room now. There are a shelf, a chair, a couch and a plate. The plate is on the shelf. There are passages to a hallway, a bedroom and a kitchen here.
You put the potted plant on the couch.
You can't go to a broom closet from here.
You are in a hallway now. There are passages to a living room and a broom closet here.
You are in a broom closet now. There are a broom and a mop. The broom is on the floor. The mop is on the floor. There is a passage to a hallway here.
You take the mop. In your inventory you have a mop.
You can't go to a kitchen from here.
You are in a hallway now. There are passages to a living room and a broom closet here.

You are in a living room now. There are a shelf, a chair, a couch, a potted plant and a plate. The potted plant is on the couch. The plate is on the shelf. There are passages to a hallway, a bedroom and a kitchen here.
You put the potted plant on the chair.
You are in a kitchen now. There are a cupboard and a counter. The cupboard is open. There are passages to a living room and a pantry here.
You put the mop in the cupboard.
The cupboard is now open. In the cupboard there is a mop.

> take mop out of cupboard and put it in freezer is not a valid action. 
> go to pantry is not valid either, there is no passage to freezer.
The correct action is: 
> go to living room
I don't know what you mean.
You are in a pantry now. There are a table, a freezer and a refrigerator. The freezer is closed. The refrigerator is closed. There is a passage to a kitchen here.
The freezer is now open. The freezer is empty.

> go to kitchen is not valid because I have the mop. 
> put mop in freezer
I don't know what you mean.
You can't see a mop here.
You are in a kitchen now. There are a mop, a cupboard and a counter. The mop is in the cupboard. The cupboard is open. There are passages to a living room and a pantry here.

> take mop out of cupboard. No, a more valid action is: 
> go to pantry

You take the mop. In your inventory you have a mop.
You are in a pantry now. There are a table, a freezer and a refrigerator. The freezer is open. The refrigerator is closed. There is a passage to a kitchen here.
You put the mop in the freezer.
